20101231000040.000|20101231000040.000|CC1|CALIFORNIA.                     
20101231000040.000|20101231000042.000|CC1|GUSTS AS HIGH AS 60 TO 70

20101231000048.000|20101231000052.000|CC1|YEARS CAME CRASHING DOWN,       
20101231000052.000|20101231000054.000|CC1|DAMAGING A NUMBER OF CARS,      
20101231000054.000|20101231000055.000|CC1|INCLUDING THIS WOMAN.

20101231000631.000|20101231000632.000|CC1|BEGINNING LAST APRIL.
